segment.source: Troubleshoot Windows Store for Business (Windows 10)
segment.target: Troubleshoot Windows Store for Business (Windows 10)

segment.source: Troubleshooting topics for Windows Store for Business.
segment.target: Troubleshooting topics for Windows Store for Business.

segment.source: Troubleshoot Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Troubleshoot Windows Store for Business

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Troubleshooting topics for Windows Store for Business.
segment.target: Troubleshooting topics for Windows Store for Business.

segment.source: Can't find apps in private store
segment.target: Can't find apps in private store

segment.source: The private store for your organization is a page in the Windows Store app that contains apps that are private to your organization.
segment.target: The private store for your organization is a page in the Windows Store app that contains apps that are private to your organization.

segment.source: After your organization acquires an app, your Store for Business admin can add it to your organization's private store.
segment.target: After your organization acquires an app, your Store for Business admin can add it to your organization's private store.

segment.source: Your private store usually has a name that is close to the name of your organization or company.
segment.target: Your private store usually has a name that is close to the name of your organization or company.

segment.source: If you can't see your private store, there are a couple of things to check:
segment.target: If you can't see your private store, there are a couple of things to check:

segment.source: No apps in the private store - The private store page is only available in the Windows Store app if there are apps added to your private store.
segment.target: No apps in the private store - The private store page is only available in the Windows Store app if there are apps added to your private store.

segment.source: You won't see your private store page with no apps listed on it.
segment.target: You won't see your private store page with no apps listed on it.

segment.source: If your Store for Business admin has added an app to the private store, and the private store page is still not available, they can check the private store status for the app on the Inventory page.
segment.target: If your Store for Business admin has added an app to the private store, and the private store page is still not available, they can check the private store status for the app on the Inventory page.

segment.source: If the status is Add in progress, wait and check back.
segment.target: If the status is Add in progress, wait and check back.

segment.source: Signed in with the wrong account - If you have multiple accounts that you use in your organization, you might be signed in with the wrong account.
segment.target: Signed in with the wrong account - If you have multiple accounts that you use in your organization, you might be signed in with the wrong account.

segment.source: Or, you might not be signed in.
segment.target: Or, you might not be signed in.

segment.source: Use this procedure to sign in with your organization account.
segment.target: Use this procedure to sign in with your organization account.

segment.source: To sign in with organization account in Windows Store app
segment.target: To sign in with organization account in Windows Store app

segment.source: Click the people icon in Windows Store app, and click Sign in.
segment.target: Click the people icon in Windows Store app, and click Sign in.

segment.source: Sign in to Store app with a different account
segment.target: Sign in to Store app with a different account

segment.source: Click Add account, and then click Work or school account.
segment.target: Click Add account, and then click Work or school account.

segment.source: Choose an account to use
segment.target: Choose an account to use

segment.source: Type the email account and password, and click Sign in.
segment.target: Type the email account and password, and click Sign in.

segment.source: Sign in for work or school account
segment.target: Sign in for work or school account

segment.source: You should see the private store for your organization.
segment.target: You should see the private store for your organization.

segment.source: In our example, the page is named Contoso publishing.
segment.target: In our example, the page is named Contoso publishing.

segment.source: Private store with name highlighted
segment.target: Private store with name highlighted

segment.source: Click the private store to see apps in your private store.
segment.target: Click the private store to see apps in your private store.

segment.source: Private store for Contoso publishing
segment.target: Private store for Contoso publishing

segment.source: Still having trouble?
segment.target: Still having trouble?

segment.source: If you are still having trouble using WSfB or installing the app, you can get more help on our Support page.
segment.target: If you are still having trouble using WSfB or installing the app, you can get more help on our Support page.
